name: Creatures of Shadow
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION:

Creatures of Shadow lurk within the darkness of the city, patiently awaiting their next victim.

Taking place in an apocalyptic city consumed by snow, Hammond must find his way back to his colony to reunite himself with his people after becoming separated from his group. But in order to get there, he must make his way through the streets and sewers, avoiding the many dangers surrounding him. Should be a piece of cake... then again, famous last words, right?

DEV NOTE:

This is a short fixed-camera horror game. It's based on an older prototype game jam game I made called IAMNOTSORRY. This game is a massive improvement to that prototype. After a few months, I'm happy to bring you Creatures of Shadow! Lemme know what you think!
